pregunta: Esta solicitando a las autoridades locales
respuesta: He's applying to the local authorities
incorrecta1: He applies to the local authorities
incorrecta2: He apply to the local authorities
incorrecta3: He's apply to the local authorities

respuesta: He has applied for a new job
incorrecta1: He applied   for a new job
incorrecta2: He have applied  for a new job

respuesta: He applied to a charitable organization
incorrecta1: He apply  to a charitable organization
incorrecta2: He has apply  to a charitable organization
incorrecta3: He had applied   to a charitable organization

pregunta: Pondrá presión para conseguir lo que quiere
respuesta: He will apply pressure to get want he wants
incorrecta1: He would apply   pressure to get want he wants
incorrecta2: He's going to apply   pressure to get want he wants
incorrecta3: He will applied    pressure to get want he wants

pregunta: Va a solicitar unirse a la policía
respuesta: He's going to apply to join the police
incorrecta1: He would apply  to join the police
incorrecta2: He will apply   to join the police
incorrecta3: He's going to applied  to join the police
